/*CYJian txdy!*/
#include <cstdio>
#include <string>   
#include <cstring>
#include <iostream>
#include <algorithm>
using namespace std;
typedef long long ll;

const int N=5e4+5;
int n,m,T,cnt,p[N],bel[N];

template <typename T> inline void IN(T&x) {
    char ch;bool flag=0;x=0;
    while(ch=getchar(),!isdigit(ch)) if(ch=='-') flag=1;
    while(isdigit(ch)) x=x*10+ch-'0',ch=getchar();
    if(flag) x=-x;
}

int p1[N],p2[N],c1,c2;
int main() {
    IN(n),IN(T),m=(1<<n)-1;
    for(int i=1;i<=n;++i) IN(p[i]);
    for(int i=n;i>=1;--i) bel[p[i]+1]?bel[p[i]]=bel[p[i]+1]:(bel[p[i]]=p[i],++cnt);
    int ans=0;
    while((1<<ans)<cnt) ++ans;
    printf("%d\n",ans);
    if(T) {
        for(int i=1;i<=n;++i) printf("%d ",p[i]);
        puts("");
        for(int i=n;i>=1;--i) bel[i]=(bel[i]==i)?--cnt:bel[i+1];
        for(int i=0;i<ans;++i) {
            c1=c2=0;
            for(int j=1;j<=n;++j) (bel[p[j]]&(1<<i))?p2[++c2]=p[j]:p1[++c1]=p[j];
            for(int j=1;j<=c1;++j) p[j]=p1[j];
            for(int j=1;j<=c2;++j) p[j+c1]=p2[j];
            for(int j=1;j<=n;++j) printf("%d ",p[j]);
            puts("");
        }
    }
    return 0;
}

namespace _ {
    queue <int> q;
    int tim,fa[N],vis[N],pre[N],col[N],match[N];
    inline int find(int x) {
        while(x!=fa[x]) x=fa[x]=fa[fa[x]];
        return x;
    }
    inline int lca(int x,int y) {
        ++tim,x=find(x),y=find(y);
        for(;;swap(x,y)) {
            if(!x) continue;
            if(vis[x]==tim) return x;
            vis[x]=tim,x=match[x]?find(pre[match[x]]):0;
        }
    }
    inline void blossom(int x,int y,int t) {
        while(find(x)!=t) {
            pre[x]=y,y=match[x];
            if(col[y]==2) col[y]=1,q.push(y);
            fa[x]=fa[y]=t,x=pre[y];
        }
    }
    inline bool solve(int s) {
        memset(pre,0,sizeof(pre));
        memset(col,0,sizeof(col));
        for(int i=1;i<=n;++i) fa[i]=i;
        while(!q.empty()) q.pop();
        q.push(s),col[s]=1;
        while(!q.empty()) {
            int u=q.front();q.pop();
            for(int v:G[u]) {
                if(!col[v]) {
                    col[v]=2,pre[v]=u;
                    if(!match[v]) {
                        for(int las;u;v=las,u=pre[v])
                            las=match[u],match[u]=v,match[v]=u;	
                        return true;
                    } else q.push(match[v]),col[match[v]]=1;					
                } else if(col[v]==1&&find(u)!=find(v)) {
                    int t=lca(u,v);
                    blossom(u,v,t),blossom(v,u,t);
                }
            }
        }
        return false;
    }

} using namespace _;

int main() {
    IN(n),IN(m);
    for(int i=1;i<=m;++i) addedge();
    for(int i=1;i<=n;++i) if(!match[i]&&solve(i)) ++ans;
    printf("%d\n",ans);
    return puts(""),0;xuyaozhuyi
}

Code2:\rm{Code_2:}Code2â€‹:

namespace Flower_tree {
    queue <int> q;
    int tim,fa[N],vis[N],pre[N],col[N],match[N];
    inline int find(int x) {
        while(x!=fa[x]) x=fa[x]=fa[fa[x]];
        return x;
    }
    inline int lca(int x,int y) {
        ++tim,x=find(x),y=find(y);
        for(;;swap(x,y)) {
            if(!x) continue;
            if(vis[x]==tim) return x;
            vis[x]=tim,x=match[x]?find(pre[match[x]]):0;
        }
    }
    inline void blossom(int x,int y,int t) {
        while(find(x)!=t) {
            pre[x]=y,y=match[x];
            if(col[y]==2) col[y]=1,q.push(y);
            fa[x]=fa[y]=t,x=pre[y];
        }
    }
    inline bool check(int s) {
        memset(pre,0,sizeof(pre));
        memset(col,0,sizeof(col));
        for(int i=1;i<=L;++i) fa[i]=i;
        while(!q.empty()) q.pop();
        q.push(s),col[s]=1;
        while(!q.empty()) {
            int u=q.front();q.pop();
            for(int v:G[u]) {
                if(!col[v]) {
                    col[v]=2,pre[v]=u;
                    if(!match[v]) {
                        for(int las;u;v=las,u=pre[v])
                            las=match[u],match[u]=v,match[v]=u;	
                        return true;
                    } else q.push(match[v]),col[match[v]]=1;					
                } else if(col[v]==1&&find(u)!=find(v)) {
                    int t=lca(u,v);
                    blossom(u,v,t),blossom(v,u,t);
                }
            }
        }
        return false;
    }
    inline int solve() {
        int ans=0;
        for(int i=1;i<=L;++i) if(!match[i]&&check(i)) ++ans;
        return ans;
    }
} using namespace Flower_tree;

inline void Main() {
    memset(match,0,sizeof(match)),
    memset(vis,0,sizeof(vis)),tim=0;
    IN(n),IN(m),IN(e),L=n+m+m+m;
    for(int i=1;i<=L;++i) G[i].clear();
    int x,y;
    for(int i=1;i<=e;++i) {
        IN(x),IN(y);
        addedge(x,n+y),addedge(x,n+m+y),addedge(x,n+2*m+y);
    }
    for(int i=1;i<=m;++i)
        addedge(n+i,n+m+i),addedge(n+i,n+2*m+i),addedge(n+m+i,n+2*m+i);
    printf("%d\n",solve()-n);
    for(int i=1;i<=n;++i) printf("%d ",(match[i]-n-1)%m+1);
    return puts(""),void();
}

int T;
int main() {
    IN(T);
    while(T--) Main();
    return 0;
}

ans=âˆpÂ isÂ primeâˆk>0(pk)g(pk)=âˆpÂ isÂ primeâˆk>0(pk)f(pk)âˆ’f(pk+1)=âˆpÂ isÂ primeâˆk>0pk(f(pk)âˆ’f(pk+1))=âˆpÂ isÂ primepâˆ‘k>0k(f(pk)âˆ’f(pk+1))=âˆpÂ isÂ primepâˆ‘k>0f(pk)\begin{aligned} ans&=\prod_{p\ is\ prime} \prod_{k>0} (p^k)^{g(p^k)}\\ &=\prod_{p\ is\ prime} \prod_{k>0} (p^k)^{f(p^k)-f(p^{k+1})}\\ &=\prod_{p\ is\ prime} \prod_{k>0} p^{k(f(p^k)-f(p^{k+1}))}\\ &=\prod_{p\ is\ prime} p^{\sum_{k>0}k(f(p^k)-f(p^{k+1}))}\\ &=\prod_{p\ is\ prime} p^{\sum_{k>0}f(p^k)}\\ \end{aligned} ansâ€‹=pÂ isÂ primeâˆâ€‹k>0âˆâ€‹(pk)g(pk)=pÂ isÂ primeâˆâ€‹k>0âˆâ€‹(pk)f(pk)âˆ’f(pk+1)=pÂ isÂ primeâˆâ€‹k>0âˆâ€‹pk(f(pk)âˆ’f(pk+1))=pÂ isÂ primeâˆâ€‹pâˆ‘k>0â€‹k(f(pk)âˆ’f(pk+1))=pÂ isÂ primeâˆâ€‹pâˆ‘k>0â€‹f(pk)â€‹

static int tmp[N],sum[N];
for(int i=1;i<=cnt;++i) if(prime[i]<=lim) {
    const int p=prime[i];
    tmp[0]=1,tmp[1]=p;
    for(int j=2;j<=n;++j) tmp[j]=mul(tmp[j-1],tmp[j-1]);
    for(int j=1;j<=n;++j) tmp[j]=mul(tmp[j-1],tmp[j]);
    for(int x=p;x<=W;x*=p) {
        for(int k=1;k<=n;++k) sum[k]=(bool)(a[k]%x==0);
        for(int k=2;k<=n;++k) sum[k]+=sum[k-1];
        for(int k=1;k<=m;++k) ans[q[k].id]=mul(ans[q[k].id],tmp[sum[q[k].r]-sum[q[k].l-1]]);
    }
}

æ¥ä¸‹æ¥å£èƒ¡ï¼Œæ˜¾ç„¶éœ€è¦å¤„ç†çš„è´¨æ•°çš„ä¸ªæ•°ä¸è¶…è¿‡ n\sqrt{n}nâ€‹ ä¸ªï¼Œå¯¹äº pkp^kpk çš„æšä¸¾æœ€å¤š logâ¡n\log nlogn æ¬¡ï¼Œå¤æ‚åº¦ç“¶é¢ˆåœ¨äºæ±‚ tmptmptmp ï¼Œå› æ­¤è¿™ä¸€æ®µçš„å¤æ‚åº¦æ˜¯ O(nn)O(n\sqrt{n})O(nnâ€‹) çš„ã€‚

nâ‰¤105n\leq 10^5nâ‰¤105 ï¼Œå€¼åŸŸèŒƒå›´è·Ÿ nnn åŒé˜¶ï¼Œè¯¥å¤æ‚åº¦è¶³ä»¥é€šè¿‡æ­¤é¢˜ã€‚

#include <cstdio>
#include <string>
#include <string>
#include <iostream>
#include <algorithm>
using namespace std;

const int N=15+5;
const int M=(1<<15)+5;
const int mod=1e9+7;

int n,m,S;
int a[N],R[N],to[N],ID[N],Mi[M],tag[M],dp[N][M];

template <typename _Tp> inline void IN(_Tp&x) {
    char ch;bool flag=0;x=0;
    while(ch=getchar(),!isdigit(ch)) if(ch=='-') flag=1;
    while(isdigit(ch)) x=x*10+ch-'0',ch=getchar();
    if(flag) x=-x;
}

inline bool cmp(int x,int y) {return R[x]<R[y];}
int main() {
    IN(n),IN(m),S=(1<<n)-1;
    for(int i=0;i<n;++i) IN(R[i]),ID[i]=i,++R[i];
    sort(ID,ID+n,cmp);
    for(int i=0;i<n;++i) a[i]=R[ID[i]],to[ID[i]]=i;
    for(int i=1;i<=m;++i) {
        int u,v;
        IN(u),IN(v),u=to[u-1],v=to[v-1];
        for(int s=0;s<=S;++s)
            if((s&(1<<u))&&(s&(1<<v))) tag[s]=true;
    }
    for(int s=1;s<=S;++s)
        for(int i=0;i<n;++i)
            if(s&(1<<i)) {Mi[s]=i;break;}
    dp[0][S]=1;
    for(int i=0;i<n;++i)
        for(int s=0;s<=S;++s) if(dp[i][s])
            for(int t=s;t;t=s&(t-1))
                if(!tag[t]&&((1<<Mi[s])&t)&&a[Mi[t]]>i)
                    (dp[i+1][s^t]+=1ll*dp[i][s]*(a[Mi[t]]-i)%mod)%=mod;
    int ans=0;
    for(int i=1;i<=n;++i) (ans+=1ll*dp[i][0]*i%mod)%=mod;
    printf("%d\n",ans);
    return 0;
}

T3:\rm{T3}:T3:äººç”Ÿå§

/*CYJian txdy!*/
#include <cmath>
#include <vector>
#include <cstdio>
#include <string>   
#include <cstring>
#include <iostream>
#include <algorithm>
using namespace std;
typedef long long ll;

const int W=1e5;
const int N=1e5+5;
const int mod=998244353;
int n,m,a[N];
int ID[N],len[N];
vector <int> bin[N],inv[N];

template <typename T> inline void IN(T&x) {
    char ch;bool flag=0;x=0;
    while(ch=getchar(),!isdigit(ch)) if(ch=='-') flag=1;
    while(isdigit(ch)) x=x*10+ch-'0',ch=getchar();
    if(flag) x=-x;
}

inline int mul(const int &x,const int &y) {return 1ll*x*y%mod;}
inline int del(const int &x,const int &y) {return (x-y<0)?x+mod-y:x-y;}
inline int add(const int &x,const int &y) {return (x+y<mod)?x+y:x-mod+y;}
inline int modpow(int x,int y,int res=1) {
    for(;y;y>>=1,x=1ll*x*x%mod) if(y&1) res=1ll*res*x%mod;
    return res;
}

namespace Prime {
    int cnt,_mi[N],vis[N],prime[N];
    inline void _pre_() {
        for(int i=2;i<=W;++i) {
            if(!vis[i]) prime[++cnt]=i,_mi[i]=cnt;
            for(int j=1;j<=cnt&&i*prime[j]<=W;++j) {
                vis[prime[j]*i]=1,_mi[prime[j]*i]=j;
                if(!(i%prime[j])) break;
            }
        }
    }
} using namespace Prime;

namespace Mo {
    int res(1),block,ans[N],tot[N];
    struct Node {int l,r,id;} q[N];
    inline bool cmp(Node a,Node b) {
        return (a.l/block)^(b.l/block)?a.l<b.l:(((a.l/block)&1)?a.r<b.r:a.r>b.r);
    }
    inline void add(const int &x) {if(x) res=mul(res,bin[x][tot[x]]),++tot[x];}
    inline void del(const int &x) {if(x) --tot[x],res=mul(res,inv[x][tot[x]]);}
} using namespace Mo;

int main() {
    //freopen("c.in","r",stdin);
    //freopen("c.out","w",stdout);
    IN(n),IN(m),_pre_();
    for(int i=1;i<=n;++i) IN(a[i]);
    for(int i=1;i<=m;++i) IN(q[i].l),IN(q[i].r),q[i].id=i,ans[i]=1;
    const int lim=sqrt(W);
    for(int i=1;i<=W;++i) {
        int num=i;
        while(num>1) {
            const int now=_mi[num];
            while(num%prime[now]==0) num/=prime[now];
            if(prime[now]>lim) ID[i]=now;
        }
    }
    for(int i=1;i<=n;++i) if(ID[a[i]]) ++len[ID[a[i]]];
    for(int i=1;i<=cnt;++i) if(prime[i]>lim) {
        bin[i].resize(len[i]+1),
        inv[i].resize(len[i]+1);
        bin[i][0]=prime[i],inv[i][0]=modpow(prime[i],mod-2);
        for(int j=1;j<=len[i];++j) bin[i][j]=mul(bin[i][j-1],bin[i][j-1]);
        for(int j=1;j<=len[i];++j) inv[i][j]=mul(inv[i][j-1],inv[i][j-1]);
    }
    block=pow(n,(double)2/(double)3);
    sort(q+1,q+1+m,cmp);
    int l=1,r=0;
    for(int i=1;i<=m;++i) {
        while(r<q[i].r) add(ID[a[++r]]);
        while(l>q[i].l) add(ID[a[--l]]);
        while(r>q[i].r) del(ID[a[r--]]);
        while(l<q[i].l) del(ID[a[l++]]);
        ans[q[i].id]=mul(res,ans[q[i].id]);
    }
    static int tmp[N],sum[N];
    for(int i=1;i<=cnt;++i) if(prime[i]<=lim) {
        const int p=prime[i];
        tmp[0]=1,tmp[1]=p;
        for(int j=2;j<=n;++j) tmp[j]=mul(tmp[j-1],tmp[j-1]);
        for(int j=1;j<=n;++j) tmp[j]=mul(tmp[j-1],tmp[j]);
        for(int x=p;x<=W;x*=p) {
            for(int k=1;k<=n;++k) sum[k]=(bool)(a[k]%x==0);
            for(int k=2;k<=n;++k) sum[k]+=sum[k-1];
            for(int k=1;k<=m;++k) ans[q[k].id]=mul(ans[q[k].id],tmp[sum[q[k].r]-sum[q[k].l-1]]);
        }
    }
    for(int i=1;i<=m;++i) printf("%d\n",(ans[i]+mod)%mod);
    return 0;
}

entry.content:
é¢˜é¢ä¼ é€é—¨ğŸš€

Solution

T1:A\rm{T1} :AT1:A

é¦–å…ˆè€ƒè™‘å¾ˆæš´åŠ›çš„åšæ³•ï¼Œç›´æ¥å€å¢ NTT\rm{NTT}NTT å¯ä»¥æ‹¿åˆ° 404040 ã€‚

è€ƒè™‘æ»¡åˆ†åšæ³•ï¼Œä»¤ P(y)=âˆ‘i=0xpiyiP(y)=\sum_{i=0}^{x}p_iy^iP(y)=âˆ‘i=0xâ€‹piâ€‹yi ã€‚

æ˜¾ç„¶ç­”æ¡ˆä¸º Pn(y)P^n(y)Pn(y) ï¼Œç°åœ¨å¯¹ Pn+1(y)P^{n+1}(y)Pn+1(y) è¿›è¡Œæ±‚å¯¼ï¼Œæœ‰ä¸¤ç§æ–¹æ³•ï¼š

T1:A\rm{T1} :AT1:A

å’•å’•å’•

T2:B\rm{T2} :BT2:B

#include <cstdio>
#include <string>
#include <string>
#include <iostream>
#include <algorithm>
using namespace std;

const int N=2e5+5;
const int M=325;
const int mod=998244353;
int n,m,q,a[N];

inline int modpow(int x,int y,int res=1) {
    for(;y;y>>=1,x=1ll*x*x%mod) if(y&1) res=1ll*res*x%mod;
    return res;
}
template <typename _Tp> inline void IN(_Tp&x) {
    char ch;bool flag=0;x=0;
    while(ch=getchar(),!isdigit(ch)) if(ch=='-') flag=1;
    while(isdigit(ch)) x=x*10+ch-'0',ch=getchar();
    if(flag) x=-x;
}

int fac[N],inv[N],tmp[N],qaq[N];
inline int C(int n,int m) {
    if(n<m||n<0||m<0) return 0;
    return 1ll*fac[n]*inv[n-m]%mod*inv[m]%mod;
}
inline int calc(int l,int r,int i) {
    if(l>r) return 0;
    return 1ll*((tmp[r-i]-tmp[l-i-1]+mod)%mod)*qaq[i]%mod;
}
int cnt,vis[N],F[M][N];
inline int solve(int x,int k) {
    if(!vis[k]) {
        vis[k]=++cnt;
        int res=0;
        for(int i=m-1;i>=1;--i)
            F[cnt][i]=(res+1ll*C(i-k,n-k)*qaq[i]%mod)%mod,
        res=(res+1ll*C(i-k-1,n-k-1)*qaq[i]%mod)%mod;
    }
    return F[vis[k]][x];
}

int k;
int main() {
    IN(n),IN(q),m=n<<1;
    fac[0]=inv[0]=qaq[0]=1;
    for(int i=1;i<=m;++i) fac[i]=1ll*fac[i-1]*i%mod;
    for(int i=1;i<=m;++i) inv[i]=modpow(fac[i],mod-2);
    for(int i=1;i<=m;++i) qaq[i]=1ll*qaq[i-1]*modpow(2,mod-2)%mod;
    for(int i=1;i<=m;++i) tmp[i]=(tmp[i-1]+1ll*qaq[i]*C(i-1,n-1)%mod)%mod;
    for(int i=1;i<=q;++i) {
        IN(k),a[0]=0,a[k+1]=m;
        for(int j=1;j<=k;++j) IN(a[j]);
        int ans=0;
        for(int j=0;j<=k;++j) ans=(ans+calc(a[j]+1,a[j+1]-1,j))%mod;
        ans=(ans+solve(a[k],k))%mod;
        printf("%d\n",2ll*ans%mod);
    }
    return 0;
}
